experience: You and Arlyn both know Frank Schab, Lance Faulkner, CSM, CSPO, and 46 others

Clients past and present: Airborne Express, Alaska Airlines, Ameritech, Arizona Diamondbacks, Arizona Rattlers, ASML, AVNET, Bank of America, Best Western Hotels, Big Bear Mountain Spring Water, Breitfeld & Schliekert, CapitalOne, Casino of the Sun, Cellular One, Chandler Regional Hospital, Cold Stone Creamery, Computer Associates, Cox Communications, The Dial Corporation, DriveTime, eFunds, Fascinations, Health Systems Technologies, Hewlett-Packard, Imaging Endpoints, JDA Software, MGM Grand Hotel, Motorola, NDC Health Information Services, Nikko Materials, Nissan Automotive, OmniMount, Pacific Northwest Ballet, Phoenix Mercury, The Phoenix Open, Phoenix Suns, Phoenix Ad Club, PhotoDisc, RealNetworks, ReBath, Rohm & Haas, Siemens Medical, Sittercity, Smith & Wesson, Starwood Hotels & Resorts, TP Orthodontics, UltraDNS, Verde Valley School, Westin Hotel & Resorts

I was one of three staff writers in a 60-person advertising agency in Seattle, Washington. I did a lot of print ads and direct mail for Hewlett-Packard, our biggest client. Before that, I was the staff copyeditor, which was really just a fancy title for proofreader. It was a lot of pressure, but I survived the ordeal (thank you, Zoloft).

I've been a traveling T-shirt salesman with the Ice Capades, a strolling ukulele player at Busch Gardens, a payroll processor for a chain of natural food stores, and the personal assistant to a blind graduate student from Malaysia. One summer I even sold vacuum cleaners door to door (perhaps you're familiar with the amazing Filter Queen). All this proves that I lost my sense of shame long before I got into advertising.

Shawn Rooker
Austin Realtor at Realty Austin
January 6, 2014, Arlyn was a client of Shawn’s

Shawn is a very accomplished and effective realtor. He was great to work with because he took a personal interest in my property. He approached me with a smart strategy for making the most of the market conditions at the time. He got us full value for our home, with the best possible price at the right time. Shawn also masterfully negotiated a backup offer and used it as leverage to close the sale on the best possible terms. He went the extra mile helping us to stage the house, as well, and even helped us coordinate our move. He was solid, dependable and available throughout the process, always taking my calls or returning them promptly, keeping me fully informed. Whether you are buying or selling, I believe you are in excellent hands with Shawn.

summary: I develop concepts and write copy for all kinds of advertising and marketing communication projects. That includes TV, radio and video scripts, print ads, direct mail packages, brochures, sales sheets, Web site copy, eblasts, newsletters, presentation slides, leave-behinds, mission statements-just about anything meant to get your attention, communicate an idea, explain a process, or persuade you to buy something.Specialties: Radio commercials, corporate videos, business-to-business advertising and marketing communications, high-tech marketing, medical marketing
